title: Rxn is favored at high T but not low T - dS and dH

content.question: Which of the following reactions is not thermodynamically favored at low temperatures but becomes favored as the temperature increases?

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
